meanings.definition: The liquid remaining after a substance has been lysed.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the lysates under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The lysates were carefully collected and analyzed in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The lysates seemed to dance under the light, creating a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent4: The lysates resembled a colorful rainbow after the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the lysates filled the room, reminding everyone of the experiment.

meanings.definition: To break down (cells or tissues) by lysis.
meanings.sent1: The enzyme lysates the cells to release their contents.
meanings.sent2: She lysates the tissue samples to extract the proteins.
meanings.sent3: The blender lysates the fruits into a delicious smoothie.
meanings.sent4: His words lysates her heart, leaving her feeling broken.
meanings.sent5: The storm lysates the sandcastle, washing it away into the sea.
